Traits.Name: Tactics Aura
Traits.Description: Foes suffering from a status in range 3 take bonus damage.

Interrupts.Name: Discipline
Interrupts.Trigger: An ally in the tactics aura misses with an attack.
Interrupts.Effect: The Drillmaster can use this interrupt to cause them to re-roll the attack with +1 boon, taking the second result as the final result.
